text: Zenon Burzawa (born 1 July 1961) is a retired Polish football striker and later manager. He was the Ekstraklasa top goalscorer in 1993-94. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Stilon Gorzów Wielkopolski players Category:Sporting Club Lyon players Category:Aluminium Konin players Category:Association football forwards Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Polish football managers Category:GKP Gorzów Wielkopolski managers Category:Sportspeople from Gorzów Wielkopolski
title: Zenon Burzawa
